about_the_game:
Do you really know your purpose in this world?




The Society of Mages rules every aspect of the world with an iron fist, extinguishing any opposition. Never before had a person, much less a student from a prestigious school, dared to fight against them. Help Kamyla in her quest to escape from it, while being pursued by all kinds of magicians. She will meet characters who will help her as she learns ancient spells, which come from a peculiar scarlet aura.

An original game inspired by a dream




Kamyla and the Scarlet Mage is a story-driven action platformer game. Help Kamyla fight diverse adversaries and find her purpose in life by exploring the world, locating her memories and facing tough challenges in fast action-driven boss fights.

Main features


  • Classic side-scrolling action.
  • Adjustable controls optimized for 2D gameplay, compatible with popular controllers.
  • Explore lush forests, cold mountains and old castles in a world filled with mystery and magic.
  • The best defense is a good offense! Obtain spells, increased strength and speed from hidden relics.
  • Meet a diverse cast, each with their own interesting theme and background.
  • Defeat various enemies throughout many unique biomes, including a boss for each one.
  • A soundtrack that compliments the aesthetic of the game in a unique way.
